channel.title: Lots of new games, which one is everyone getting?
channel.description:
Whats up guys, so i have been looking around at a ton of new games that are coming out as in:
[b]Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R2EVWKn1HcQ[/youtube]
[b]Kingdom Hearts 3[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npjBHFb0fZM[/youtube]
[b]The Elder Scrolls Online[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0jNT5cMwxw0[/youtube]
[b]Splinter Cell: Blacklist[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wYGoFH6bWXg[/youtube]
[b]Grand Theft Auto V[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bf38HiYPMiI[/youtube]
[b]Rainbow 6: Patriots[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WqHR18sNmQc[/youtube]
[b]Fallout SF[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NpUEio_QcoI[/youtube]
[b]Call of Duty: Ghost[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zxnx3W-HA18[/youtube]
[b]Battlefeild 4[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U8HVQXkeU8U[/youtube]
Me personally, i am waiting for the new Grand Theft Auto V and also Fallout SF.
(If i missed any, post about it- make a trailer if you want.)

item.title: Lots of new games, which one is everyone getting?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I’m looking forward to Kingdom Hearts 3 and Destiny. Both games look amazing (well I can’t say that for KH3 yet, but I’m excited for it).
